text.page:
227
096-114a @#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM mo kha mu khi/ tri mu khi/ tri mu khi/ sa ha sra mu khi/ ta thA ga tA mu kha stI ha na/ ts+tshi n+da ts+tshi n+da/ b+hi n+da b+hi n+da/ swA thA nAM gats+tsha slA he swA hA/ mad se dang / pa rta ka dang / ga gon ring po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas te gshegs nam cher pa'i skran zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /the tshom med do/ /skran zhi ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
